Name: change_delay
Doc: Minimum time between triggering two on_change calls. The default value is defined at the application configuration level by the change_delay configuration option. if None, the delay is set to 300ms.

Name: on_action
Doc:
Name of a function that is triggered when a specific key is pressed. The parameters of that function are all optional:
  • state (State^): state instance.
  • id (optional[str]): the identifier of the dialog.
  • action (optional[str]): the name of the action that provoked the change.
  • payload
    • args (List):
      • key name
      • variable name
      • current value

Name: action_keys
Doc:
;-separated list of supported keys.
Authorized values are Enter, Escape, F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, F6, F7, F8, F9, F10, F11, F12
